name: Cuboid Keeper
description: Cuboid Keeper is a fast-paced arena shooter with a gripping storyline and an unique spaceship building system. Take control of the legendary Guardian of the Cube and face four advanced civilizations hell-bent on defeating you.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics card with shader model 4.0 capabilities DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 300 MB available space
